meaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>fingers</radical> to dig through the <radical>trash</radical> in the light of the <radical>moon</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> because somewhere in there is your <kanji>withdrawal</kanji> letter. What did you withdraw? Your resignation? Your troops? Whatever it was, you need to find the proof, and fast.
readingMnemonic: While looking for the <kanji>withdrawal</kanji> letter, your fingers hit a piece of <reading>鉄</reading> (てつ). Ouch!
